name: Silent Prison (RainXCat)
description:
Shhhhh.... be silent do not make a sound.

This is a demo of the game, the full game will be available before jam entry closes.

some functionality is yet to be done!

keys:

awsd to move.

spacebar to jump.

'E' to interact with items accordingly.

esc to open the menu( esc if the mouse cursor is not showing ).

right mouse to disappear the mouse cursor.
